title: magizhndoru vArttai
sahitya:
magizhndoru vArttai shonnAlum pOdumE ahankuLira aruL shurandu anjal anjal enru


anupallavi

  iha para sAdhanam EdumariyEn pada yugaLa-mallAloru paTrariyEn rAmA


caraNam    tAi mukham pArttiDum shEyanavE nAn daraNiyil un mukham pArpadariyAyO
 mAyai OTTik-koDum marumai vATTi marakata vaNNam kATTi malarkkaram nITTi
